alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Baldwin Inland; Escambia; Mobile Central; Mobile Inland; Washington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 11:18PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Mobile, central Baldwin, south central Washington, western Escambia, northwestern Santa Rosa and northwestern Escambia Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1118 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles northeast of I65 And AL 21 to 4 miles northeast of Atmore to 4 miles southwest of I65 And AL 225 to near Gulfcrest. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Prichard, Saraland, Bay Minette, Atmore, Chickasaw, Satsuma, Citronelle, Creola, Century, Flomaton, Chunchula, Stockton, McCullough, Stapleton, Gulfcrest, Axis, Mount Vernon, Jay, Pollard and Riverview. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for south central and southwestern Alabama...and northwestern Florida.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin Central; Baldwin Inland; Escambia; Mobile Central; Mobile Inland; Washington
